mapper.select: select i.*, u.userNickname from inquiry i left join user u on i.userNum = u.userNum order by i.inquiryTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (inquiryTitle, inquiryStatus, inquiryContent, inquiryTime, userNum, userIdText) values (#{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryStatus}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryTime}, #{userNum}, #{userIdText})
